summary: A company of Spanish movie makers leaves Franco's Spain and moves to Hitler's Germany to make a film in co-production. Soon some problems start to arise...
cast: Penélope Cruz|Antonio Resines|Jorge Sanz|Rosa Maria Sardà|Santiago Segura|Loles León|Jesús Bonilla|Neus Asensi|Miroslav Táborský|Johannes Silberschneider|Karel Dobrý|Götz Otto|Hanna Schygulla|María Barranco|Juan Luis Galiardo|Heinz Rilling|Jan Preucil|Borivoj Navrátil|Rudolf Bok|Marciano de la Fuente|Petr Drozda|Martin Faltýn|Jirí Knot|Zdenek Krumpl|Petr Sekanina|Otto Sevcík|Petr Vlasak|Robert Fischer
title: La niña de tus ojos
